title: Show Me The MOtive // Mo’ Money, Mo’ Problems (Part 2) // Michael Todd
description:
Giving applies to every area of our lives. Generosity isn’t about how much we’re giving, but the heart behind it. What drives you to give? We must examine our hearts to see what our motives are. Join Pastor Mike as he teaches us the way to purify our hearts and give like Jesus did.

#MoMoneyMoProblems #ShowMeTheMotive #finances #motives

Join us for service online every Sunday at 11am (CST) and on Monday’s for Monday Night Prayer at 6pm (CST).

If you received Christ through this message, text SAVED to 828282.

We would love to hear how God is touching your life through this ministry! Share your story with us by emailing mystory@transformchurch.us, or text ‘SHARE’ to 828282 for more info.

If you would like to support TC financially you can give through the TC app, or online through our website by clicking here https://transformchurch.us/give/. Text ‘GIVE’ to 828282 to give using your mobile device.

If you need prayer, email prayer@transformchurch.us!

For more information about Transformation Church, visit transformchurch.us or follow us on our social media platforms below.

Instagram- https://www.instagram.com/wearetransformation/
Facebook- https://www.facebook.com/wearetransformation/
